channel.title: Help ! i need to make a file admin :s
channel.description:
[b]ok so thats what i set the document to, I compile it, i go on i log off and player rights are back to 0 ? whats wrong[/b]
[code][ACCOUNT] character-username = david character-password = doesnt matter
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3217 character-posy = 3428 character-rights = 3 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = D3YYHS1J character-lastlogin = 20070411 character-energy = 19 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 1184
[EQUIPMENT] character-equip = 0 -1 0 character-equip = 1 -1 0 character-equip = 2 -1 0 character-equip = 3 -1 0 character-equip = 4 -1 0 character-equip = 5 -1 0 character-equip = 6 0 0 character-equip = 7 -1 0 character-equip = 8 0 0 character-equip = 9 -1 0 character-equip = 10 -1 0 character-equip = 11 0 0 character-equip = 12 -1 0 character-equip = 13 -1 0
[LOOK] character-look = 0 0 character-look = 1 7 character-look = 2 8 character-look = 3 9 character-look = 4 5 character-look = 5 0
[SKILLS] character-skill = 0 34 21600 character-skill = 1 3 250 character-skill = 2 35 24800 character-skill = 3 35 24355 character-skill = 4 1 0 character-skill = 5 1 0 character-skill = 6 1 0 character-skill = 7 1 0 character-skill = 8 1 0 character-skill = 9 1 0 character-skill = 10 1 0 character-skill = 11 1 0 character-skill = 12 1 0 character-skill = 13 1 0 character-skill = 14 1 0 character-skill = 15 1 0 character-skill = 16 1 0 character-skill = 17 1 0 character-skill = 18 1 0 character-skill = 19 1 0 character-skill = 20 1 0 character-skill = 21 1 0 character-skill = 22 1 0 character-skill = 23 1 0 character-skill = 24 1 0
[ITEMS] [/code] [BANK]
[FRIENDS]
[IGNORES]
[EOF]

item.title: Help ! i need to make a file admin :s
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

[quote=“Zezzma1410, post:6, topic:92484”]Put this is ure client

if (player.name(equals.IgnoreCase(“Your name here”))) }
{
Player.Rights == 2
{[/quote]

There’s a couple problems with that code. Put this under

admin list

in your client.java.

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Your name here")) { playerRights == 3 }

Read full topic
item.source: Help ! i need to make a file admin :s

item.title: Help ! i need to make a file admin :s
item.dc:creator: @pmgz2 pmgz2
item.description:
@pmgz2 wrote:

run your server!
Log in!
Log out!
go to char folder and edit ur player rights to 3!
make sure ur still logged off!
close the document and save!
log back on!
boom ur Owner!

Read full topic

If you did, and it still doesnt work,
Try adding the username in data/administrators
